item.description: Jay and I saw a piece on the Pour House on Phantom Gourmet and thought it would be a great place to meetup. They are supposed to have huge portions. Their site advertises a brunch then football Sunday. Brunch is served from 8am - 3pm and then watch the game at 4pm. It sounds like fun. Here's the link: http://www.pourhouseb...
item.how_to_find_us: Stacy's Cell: 720-233-6969 (previously listed Tammy's # - please update)
item.name: Brunch and Football at the Pour House
